root.name: Xbox LIVE Arcade Compilation Disc
root.description: The Xbox LIVE Arcade Compilation Disc is a disc that was included in the Xbox 360 Arcade console SKUs (sometimes along with a copy of Sega Superstar Tennis). It contained full versions of the following Xbox Live Arcade titles: Feeding Frenzy Luxor 2 Boom Boom Rocket Pac-Man Championship Edition Uno It also contains a short instructional video for the Xbox 360, game demos of Surf's Up and Viva Pinata, and game trailers of Shrek the Third and Viva Pinata.

similar_games.game: Xbox Live Hits Collection: Limbo,Trials HD and Splosion Man
